name: .JDB File Extension
summary: Learn about .JDB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Symantec Endpoint Protection (SEP), a program that protects computers against malware; contains virus and spyware definition updates; used to periodically update malware definitions when new viruses and spyware are discovered.

content: JDB files are typically downloaded from Symantec server.
NOTE: JDB files do not provide updates for the firewall component of SEP clients.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
